caption.title: ZIKV causes mortality and morbidity in AG129 mice.
caption.p: Kaplan-Meier curves illustrate the susceptibility of AG129 mice to ZIKV. Young mice were inoculated f.p. with several doses (n = 3 for doses 10 5−10 3 PFU and n = 6 for doses 10 and 1 PFU; 10 2 PFU was done as two separate independent replicates with n = 3 for each) of ZIKV ( A). All mice challenged with 10 4−1 PFU succumbed 8 d PI. Young (n = 4) and adult mice (n = 6) were inoculated f.p. with 10 5 PFU of ZIKV ( B). Mice were monitored until day 10 PI. Changes in weight were calculated daily for ZIKV- and mock-infected mice ( C). Error bars represent standard error of the mean.
